definition: basin/flower pot/unit of volume equal to 12 斗[dou3] and 8 升[sheng1], approx 128 liters/CL:個|个[ge4]
to grow/to plant/to insert/to force on sb/to fall head first

sentences.english: Don't put the fermentation container close to potting plants.
sentences.chinese: 发酵容器不能靠近盆栽植物放置。

sentences.english: You can buy potted roses, also known as container roses, or bare-root plants.
sentences.chinese: 你可以选择盆栽玫瑰，或裸根玫瑰。

sentences.english: You can buy potted roses, also known as container roses, or bare-root plants.
sentences.chinese: 你可以买盆栽玫瑰，也叫做容器玫瑰，或者裸根植物。

sentences.english: It was paved with red terra-cotta tile, and there were a few potted pine trees planted around.
sentences.chinese: 这是铺上红赤陶瓦，并有少数松树种植盆栽左右。

sentences.english: Dr Leshner says that Dr Varmus has "no interest in being a potted plant."
sentences.chinese: 莱什纳博士说瓦姆斯博士“无意成为盆栽植物。

sentences.english: You can buy potted roses, also known as container roses, or bare-root plants.
sentences.chinese: 你可以买盆栽玫瑰，也叫做容器玫瑰，或裸根植物。

sentences.english: Not only the fish held still, but the potted ivy lost spirits also.
sentences.chinese: 不仅是鱼儿无精打采，连盆栽的常春藤也没了生气。

sentences.english: Save your potted plants with help from an expert exterminator in this free video.
sentences.chinese: 保存与灭虫专家帮助您在这个免费视频盆栽。

sentences.english: Poinsettias are the best-selling potted flowering plant in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 一品红是美国最畅销的盆栽开花植物。

sentences.english: He nursed the house plants through a long winter.
sentences.chinese: 在漫长的冬季他一直精心照料室内盆栽植物。

sentences.english: One popular planting mix combines one part potting soil with one part perlite.
sentences.chinese: 其中一部份结合流行的组合盆栽种植土一部分珍珠岩。

sentences.english: Some hardy plants such as junipers can be potted in June.
sentences.chinese: 六月份时，一些针叶科植物如杜松可进行盆栽。

sentences.english: He wanted to work on an imageic essay on bonsai.
sentences.chinese: 他则想作一本盆栽的照片专集。

sentences.english: On the other side of the highway, I saw two giant bonsai trees in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 在公路的另一端，我看到远方两棵巨大的盆栽型树木。

sentences.english: Drip or ooze systems are common for pot watering .
sentences.chinese: 滴灌和渗灌系统一般也用于盆栽灌水。

sentences.english: The water-releasing regulations of water-controlled bag were studied by pot method in greenhouse.
sentences.chinese: 该文采用温室盆栽法，研究了无耗能控水袋释水规律。
